problem:
I am playing with a set of blocks where I need to arrange the blocks into stacks. Here are the actions I can do

Pick up a block
Unstack a block from on top of another block
Put down a block
Stack a block on top of another block

I have the following restrictions on my actions:
I can only pick up or unstack one block at a time.
I can only pick up or unstack a block if my hand is empty.
I can only pick up a block if the block is on the table and the block is clear. A block is clear if the block has no other blocks on top of it and if the block is not picked up.
I can only unstack a block from on top of another block if the block I am unstacking was really on top of the other block.
I can only unstack a block from on top of another block if the block I am unstacking is clear.
Once I pick up or unstack a block, I am holding the block.
I can only put down a block that I am holding.
I can only stack a block on top of another block if I am holding the block being stacked.
I can only stack a block on top of another block if the block onto which I am stacking the block is clear.
Once I put down or stack a block, my hand becomes empty.
Once you stack a block on top of a second block, the second block is no longer clear.

[STATEMENT]
As initial conditions I have that, the red block is clear, the orange block is clear, the yellow block is clear, the magenta block is clear, the black block is clear, the cyan block is clear, the green block is clear, the silver block is clear, the gold block is clear, the hand is empty, the red block is on the table, the orange block is on the table, the yellow block is on the table, the magenta block is on the table, the black block is on the table, the cyan block is on the table, the green block is on the table, the silver block is on the table and the gold block is on the table.
My goal is to have that the red block is on top of the silver block, the orange block is on top of the magenta block, the yellow block is on top of the red block, the magenta block is on top of the yellow block, the black block is on top of the orange block, the cyan block is on top of the gold block, the green block is on top of the black block and the gold block is on top of the green block.

My plan is as follows:

[PLAN]
pick up the red block
stack the red block on top of the silver block
pick up the yellow block
stack the yellow block on top of the red block
pick up the magenta block
stack the magenta block on top of the yellow block
pick up the orange block
stack the orange block on top of the magenta block
pick up the black block
stack the black block on top of the orange block
pick up the green block
stack the green block on top of the black block
pick up the gold block
stack the gold block on top of the green block
pick up the cyan block
stack the cyan block on top of the gold block
[PLAN END]

[STATEMENT]
As initial conditions I have that, the red block is clear, the blue block is clear, the orange block is clear, the white block is clear, the magenta block is clear, the black block is clear, the green block is clear, the silver block is clear, the gold block is clear, the hand is empty, the red block is on the table, the blue block is on the table, the orange block is on the table, the white block is on the table, the magenta block is on the table, the black block is on the table, the green block is on the table, the silver block is on the table and the gold block is on the table.
My goal is to have that the red block is on top of the silver block, the orange block is on top of the gold block, the white block is on top of the red block, the magenta block is on top of the white block, the black block is on top of the magenta block, the green block is on top of the black block, the silver block is on top of the orange block and the gold block is on top of the blue block.

My plan is as follows:

[PLAN]
solution:
(pick-up gold)
(stack gold blue)
(pick-up orange)
(stack orange gold)
(pick-up silver)
(stack silver orange)
(pick-up red)
(stack red silver)
(pick-up white)
(stack white red)
(pick-up magenta)
(stack magenta white)
